productsList.title: AI OpenChat - powered by GPT5 models
productsList.description:
Our AI-powered app integrates the latest GPT-4o, GPT-4o1, and Claude Sonnet 3 models to deliver a seamless, intelligent chat experience. 
Requirement: .Net Desktop Runtime should be install in order to run this app. 
Designed for productivity, the app offers auto-summarization and information querying directly from your selected document files (support PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Text...), making it easy to access insights and summaries in seconds. 
Perfect for students, professionals, and researchers, this app enhances document comprehension and boosts productivity with cutting-edge AI capabilities.
Our app is designed with your privacy in mind: all chat conversations are stored locally on your computer, ensuring that none of your personal data is uploaded or stored on the internet.
With an easy-to-use interface, this desktop app is perfect for anyone looking to integrate AI into their daily tasks without the concern of online data sharing.
The free version of this app includes limited access to the GPT-4.1-mini and GPT-4.0-mini models. To use the more advanced GPT-4.0 models, Calude Sonnet 3.7 model or Chat with PDF features, please upgrade to the PRO version. 

Important: AI-Generated Content

All AI-generated content belongs to the respective AI service provider (OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, etc.). The ownership, usage rights, and terms of service are governed by the provider you choose to use.

Disclaimer 1 : We are not responsible for any content generated by the AI models. The accuracy, appropriateness, and legality of AI-generated content are the responsibility of the AI service provider and the user.
Disclaimer 2: This application is not affiliated with OpenAI and operates independently, providing a local instance of AI-powered conversations without external data storage.
We‚Äôve added an option to report AI-generated output directly from the Privacy Policy window. To report inappropriate content, open the Privacy Policy using the button at the bottom left, scroll to the end, and click the email address to send us your report.

productsList.title: Chatotron
productsList.description:
Explore the latest updates of Chatotron, your definitive Windows application for interacting with ChatGPT, OpenAI's artificial intelligence assistant. Now, enjoy an even more personalized and efficient chatbot experience right from your desktop.

With Chatotron, you can:

- **Interact in Multiple Languages**: Utilize Chatotron in your preferred language, opening up a world of accessibility. Perfect for those seeking a multilingual GPT chat assistant.

- **Interact with Documents and URLs**: Transform the way you handle documents and web content. Chatotron now allows you to "converse" with your PDFs, Word documents, text files and web pages, creating a unique interaction experience. This feature will be continuously enhanced in future updates. Ideal for those desiring a Chat GPT user interface that handles documents and URLs.

- **Experience Enhanced Security**: Enjoy peace of mind knowing that your documents and URLs are handled locally, removing the need to upload them to third-party sites. A key aspect for those who value security in a GPT chat assistant.

- **Enjoy Greater Stability**: With our meticulous bug fixes and stability enhancements, expect a smoother, hassle-free experience.

Chatotron provides ultra-fast response times and quick access to commands, outpacing other Chat GPT interfaces in speed and efficiency. With quick keys, organized chat groups, and custom character creation, you can interact with ChatGPT like never before.

Customize your ChatGPT experience even further. Create different personalities for Chat GPT to adapt to, adding more depth to your dialogues. Use Chatotron's customizable quick keys for swift and efficient access. Save time with quick commands for prompts and repetitive phrases, maximizing your chat efficiency.

Keep your chats organized and easily identifiable with group chats and color coding. Experience the power of Chatotron, the ultimate tool for efficient, personalized, and secure chats. Try Chatotron today and discover a new level of interaction with ChatGPT right from your own operating system.

**An OpenAI API Key (either free or paid) is required to use Chatotron.**
** You can get it here: https://platform.openai.com/account/api-keys **

productsList.title: Micro Chat Executor - Make life easier
productsList.description:
Introducing a Next-Generation Digital Experience Platform

Elevate your online workflow with our cutting-edge platform, an all-encompassing solution tailored for diverse industry needs. Our platform is designed with the user in mind, offering a seamless one-click login using your Microsoft account. The login process is secure and convenient, providing immediate access for users to jump straight into their work without any hassle.

Understanding that different roles within various industries have unique requirements, our platform includes multiple roles that cater specifically to the diverse needs of professionals. By providing role-specific features and access rights, our platform ensures that users have the tools and permissions suited to their job functions, streamlining operations and enhancing productivity across the board.

At the heart of our platform is the latest Chatgpt engine‚Äîa testament to our commitment to cutting-edge technology and innovation. This engine promises to deliver a powerful and dynamic chat interface, capable of understanding and processing natural language to provide an intelligent and interactive experience for users.

Our comprehensive Markdown support is a game-changer for tech-savvy professionals. The integration of LaTex is perfect for those requiring the representation of complex mathematical expressions, while the inclusion of mermaid provides the ability to create stunning, detailed diagrams. Code highlighting is also supported, making it incredibly easy for developers to share and review code snippets with clarity and precision.

Flexibility is fundamental to our platform as it boasts a responsive design that allows for flawless use across a variety of devices and screen sizes. Whether you're on a desktop, tablet, or mobile device, the interface adapts accordingly, ensuring you have a consistently high-quality experience. Moreover, our platform offers a sleek dark mode, reducing eye strain and saving on screen energy consumption.

For those always on the go, our Progressive Web Application (PWA) technology is a standout feature, providing a native app-like experience directly from your web browser. This means installation is optional, updates are seamless, and accessibility is constant, even without an internet connection, delivering convenience at its best.

Speed is a non-negotiable feature in today's fast-paced digital environment. Thus, our platform promises a rapid first screen loading speed of around 100kb, paired with support for streaming responses that ensures efficient data processing and an uninterrupted user experience.

Innovation extends to our collection of awesome prompts that ignite creativity and drive engaging interactions. These prompts are thoughtfully designed to enhance user engagement, provide inspiration, and stimulate ideas, adding a layer of dynamism to communications.

An integral aspect of our platform is the intelligent management of chat history. We have implemented an automatic compression feature that handles extended conversations with ease. It maintains a tidy and organized chat history, supporting long interactions while also conserving your tokens, ensuring you get the most out of every session.

In conclusion, our platform stands as a beacon of efficiency, innovation, and adaptability in an ever-evolving digital landscape. By merging responsive design with powerful tech‚Äî including the latest Chatgpt engine and Markdown support‚Äîwe offer a tailored, responsive, and user-friendly platform that meets the eclectic needs of our diverse clientele. Get ready to experience the brilliance of streamlined digital interaction where speed, convenience, and intelligent design coalesce to redefine your online potential.
Subscription plan:

productsList.title: Ctrl+C
productsList.description:
Ctrl+C is a simple, lightweight and Cortana powered clipboard application for Universal Windows Platforms. If cut, copy & paste made your life easy, we just made it easier.

There is data that needs to be used repetitively across applications. It is a pain to type them again and again. Ctrl+C is your savior where you can stack up all your important data (links, mail id, address) and paste them in a jiffy. The data you store in the application as a clippy never leaves your device unless otherwise you wanted it to(:P).

You can either pin the clippy as a live tile or wait! There is even more good news. We just taught Cortana, your reliable personal assistant, how to retrieve the clippy. All you have to do is give your clippy a name and say "Control C {name}" Voila! We just made your life easier.

productsList.title: Serial Debug Assistant
productsList.description:
A communication debugging tool tailored for embedded systems, supporting serial port debugging, TCP and UDP debugging. Powerful yet easy to use, it helps you easily send and receive data, view and analyze in real time, and instantly improve development efficiency!

Main functions:

1. Receive serial port data and display it. "String" or "HEX" can be selected.
2. Supports multiple character encodings (such as: ASCII, GB2312, UNICODE, UTF-8, BIG5, shift_jis).
3. Supports multiple preset baud rates (>115200bps requires hardware support), and supports custom baud rates.
4. Supports extended commands and preset commands for easy debugging.
5. Custom command list: combine multiple commands to be sent into a list, and all commands can be automatically executed with one click.
6. Automatic frame break: Automatically wrap when there is a time interval between receiving data packets, which is convenient for observation.
7. Waveform display function: protocol data can be displayed as waveforms, supporting waveform playback and screenshots.

Note: Windows 10 requires the WebView2 runtime to be installed.
